StoryText: After a date with %FullName:NPC:1% from the office, we are back at %Pron:1:2% place and my stomach starts grumbling.
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Nothing, it will probably go away.
Head to %Pron:1:2% bathroom and try to wait it out.

OptionResult.Result: We start to kiss and my stomach grumbles and %FullName:NPC:1% is completely turned off.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I was really hoping it would just go away but right as we start to kiss my stomach grumbles even louder... several times. %FullName:NPC:1% is completely turned off and says we should call it a night. I am so embarrassed and so annoyed with myself. What did I eat at dinner?!

OptionResult.Result: I end up being in %FullName:NPC:1%'s bathroom for so long %Pron:1:1% gets weirded out.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% thinks it's weird that I spend so much time in the bathroom and asks me to leave once I come out. Also %Pron:1:1% tells everyone in our office about the situation and now everyone thinks I'm a creep!

OptionResult.Result: I'm embarrassed at first but %FullName:NPC:1% tells me not to worry and gets me some antacids.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Wow, I just asked %FullName:NPC:1% and it wasn't all that embarrassing at all. %Pron:1:1% provides me with an antacid and my stomach growling goes away. And then we continue to have a great rest of the night!
